an10.221:1.1: “Someone with ten qualities is cast down to hell.
an10.221:1.3: They kill living creatures, steal, and commit sexual misconduct. They use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. And they’re covetous, malicious, with wrong view.
an10.221:1.4: Someone with these ten qualities is cast down to hell.
an10.221:2.1: Someone with ten qualities is raised up to heaven.
an10.221:2.3: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, or commit sexual misconduct. They don’t use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. They’re contented, kind-hearted, with right view.
an10.221:2.4: Someone with these ten qualities is raised up to heaven.”
